room_title: Escape room "The Heist" by The Escape Game Minneapolis in Minneapolis - St. Paul
review: My friend and I joined three other people to solve The Heist. My adrenaline really kicked in when the timer dropped under 20 minutes. Josh gave great clues. Gonna do a different one each time my friend visits me. I would love to *work* at TEG once a week!

room_title: Escape room "The Heist" by The Escape Game Minneapolis in Minneapolis - St. Paul
review: Had a blast yesterday escaping The Heist! Great storyline, clever combination of puzzles, riddles and codes and perfect assistance and clues from our Game Master, Riley! Highly recommended! A great way to spend an hour that both tests your brain and excites the senses!

room_title: Escape room "The Heist" by The Escape Game Minneapolis in Minneapolis - St. Paul
review: Went for a company team building experience and we did The Heist. We had so much fun going through the rooms. It felt so good when we beat the game in the end.

room_title: Escape room "The Heist" by The Escape Game Minneapolis in Minneapolis - St. Paul
review: I can't speak for the other rooms, but The Heist was amazing! Someone very intelligent put a lot of thought into this clever room full of puzzles, riddles, and secrets. It's like being inside a mystery/ suspense movie. Enthusiastic, knowledgeable staff keep the game running smoothly.

room_title: Escape room "The Heist" by The Escape Game Minneapolis in Minneapolis - St. Paul
review: Our cousin, who designs escape rooms for a different brand down south, highly suggested this company and we weren't disappointed! We played the Heist; the room was well planned and excellently executed. A variety of different types of puzzles made it an invigorating play! We'll definitely be back for the other rooms!
